ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ),OR( AND( NOT(isBLANK(Opportunity__c)), NOT(isBLANK(Parent_Opportunity_Proposal__c))), AND( isBLANK(Opportunity__c), isBLANK(Parent_Opportunity_Proposal__c)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Either Opportunity or Parent Opportunity Proposal should be filled in but not both. If this proposal is a sub-proposal, only fill in the Parent Opportunity Proposal. If this is the main proposal, fill in the Opportunity.
